title: 29-sai Dokushin wa Isekai de Jiyuu ni Ikita……katta
description:
This is a story of a 29-years-old bachelor who was brought to a different world to live freely.  Caught by an "unwanted" wife from day one, his life is not going so smoothly when the entire country focuses its attention on him in ten days. Without losing to such an obstacle (?), he will continue to live on.

matches.title: My Lover Was Stolen, and I Was Kicked Out of the Hero’s Party, but I Awakened to the EX Skill “Fixed Damage” and Became Invincible. Now, Let’s Begin Some Revenge
I Don't Really Get It, but It Looks Like I Was Reincarnated in Another World
